commit message: Speed up address update on private key editing
Avoid UI jumping on address update
Update address field immediately on private key editing to prevent displaying incorrect private-public keys pair
Don't start new keypair generation if it is already running
User now can specify amount to send
Increase fee to cover all tx cases
Change external urls order because blockchain.info works better than blockexplorer.com
Fix white theme for older devices

Don't rely on android's SecureRandom: http://bitcoin.org/en/alert/2013-08-11-android
Use BouncyCastle's DigestRandomGenerator + seed based on several sources (thread entropy, times, system environment, /dev/random and default rng)
Emulators have no data in /dev/random, give up after 3 seconds
TX generate layout should not be visible on start
Update tests, ensure bg task are finished on activity destroy.
Scan qr code for private key and address.
Support Bitcoin URI (BIP 21) in QR codes
Hide scan buttons if device doesn't have camera
Minimum allowed fee is now zero
Paste from clipboard button for raw transaction field
Update tests so it doesn't left fee setting in engineering format
Accept json with unspent outputs as information about unspent transactions, open browser to easily push generated tx
Update proguard rule for barcode scanner
Update hint for unspent transactions info
Test UI for spending from an encrypted key
Update test to accept compression param for BIP38
Incorrect password can produce incorrect point for BIP38
Restrict screen shots for scan activity
fix for #5 Soft keyboard actions 'Encrypt' and 'Decrypt' doesn't work
Handle Out of memory and other errors for BIP38 encryption-decryption
Fix storing fee for different locales
Max fee set to 0.1 BTC for safety
Fix NPE in ScanActivity for emulator
TX fee calculation in library. No tests or UI yet.
Test project should use same target
Request large heap for BIP38 encoding/decoding
Generate WIF key pairs with uncompressed public keys option.
Possibility to change password for encrypted keys
Draft private key QR popup: qr code view, printing & sharing for WIF and other available key types.
Translation and additional icons for QR code popup
People ask to make key type bold
Printed private key QR code now have address in title.
Decrypting/encrypting actually takes a minute or more only on quite old devices.
Print QR code for corresponding address too
Always show spend panel for consistency. Fix tests.
Fixed incorrect state on activity restore

fixes #7 Crash by clicking on options
It crashes when there is a persisted fee stored as string with unsupported format
Ensure that any incorrect stored value would not cause crash. #7
fix for Continuous field validation makes it hard to correctly enter Bitcoin amount. #13
Add QR-code button next to public key address. #11

First step for automatic fee calculation.
changed: way to verify input data for spending transaction.
introduced: error codes from BTCUtils.
fixed: Show QR code button for manually entered addresses
todo: 1. Specify confirmations count for raw transactions. 2. Display tx importance. 3. editText.setError() should not be used at all.
Better error handling - no more 'TextView.setError', fix crash what happens sometimes for unencrypted private keys, better amount parsing.
Fix tests, few lint warnings plus some BitcoinException usages in Transaction class
Show checkbox to indicate that input raw transaction have enough confirmations for no-fee transaction or show description why it is not possible.
Code cleanup, fixing few warnings, json parsing error reporting

Refresh project:
1) ant build was retired, gradle build was significantly improved
2) fixed crash in view address' QR code
3) UI update for lollipops
4) Fixed or muted many warnings
5) Update android support library, it's now in gradle
Upgrade digest in random number generator
Automatically add missed json curly braces, update tests
Change default private key type to generate to compressed WIF
Gradle build was broken if no signed config found
Android 6.0 Support - set target api, add permissions support, update zbar libraries, fix camera preview for Nexus 5X
Remove supportv4 dependency. Update spongycastle dependency, move it to gradle.
Reminder about testing in debug builds
Set target api level to 24 (Android N)
